name: Highscore Processing Unit
description: Highscore Processing Unit is here to revive this old time feeling of arcade games. Play fast, break your highscore, break all the highscores, and take the glory! From the ashes of the outmoded breakout genre, rises an entirely revamped gameplay. Feel free to insert a coin and take your chance...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 1.0 Ghz Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 90 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Low-end laptop friendly
